General.Name: Tcc Steel
General.Description: TCC Steel Corp. produces and sells steel products in South Korea. The company's products include tinplate, tin free, nickel-plated, copper-plated, super tin, and laminated steel used in various applications. It exports its products in approximately 60 countries. The company was formerly known as Dongyang Tinplate Corp. and changed its name to TCC Steel Corp. in March 2003. TCC Steel Corp. was founded in 1959 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
